column8: text

https://m.malaysiakini.com/news/385225Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak today announced a Hari Raya incentive of RM500 for Felda settlers but said those who had taken Felda to court or refused to sell their produce to the agency would not be receiving it."I would like to clarify the incentive, we will only be paying it to those who have done business with Felda."Those who have not done business with Felda, or those who have sued Felda - I'm sorry, they are not on the list," he told the audience at a breaking of fast event at Felda Sungai Sayong in Kulai, Johor this evening.Najib said the Hari Raya incentive will cost the government RM47.2 million...To read full article, subscribe or sign in belowjoe_mamak please provide username and password.......

u are a towkay of a factory..u hire 100 staff...90 staff works for u, provide volume of product for u..but there's this 10 staff who using ur factory machine to produce the same product but they distributed it to ur competitor because ur competitor pay higher price for the product..at the same time u already plan to give bonus to all ur staffquestion; will u give ur bonus also to this 10 staff who 'works' for ur competitor? what will u do to this staff?that's more or less of what happen with FELDA & their settlers

i bet those who didn't get the bonus couldn't care less.especially since the total bonus is less than rm1k, when they deserve more or get more if dealing with outside palm oil miller.crude palm oil price are on the rise now, ppl will go to buyer who pay more, simple economics really.if not mistaken, other company that pay more than felda include sime darby, IOI and FFM (robert kuok's palm oil mill)...
If they sell the produce outside, pretty sure earn more than RM 500 bonus. Butthurt to bijaN.
Of course sime darby and ioi will pay moreCoz they dont provide you with a freaking big ass land to plant and cultivate, seed, fertilizer, interest free loan and other settlers benefits Common sense

lies.it's not interest free.but interest or kadar keuntungan is lower than what commercial banks give, that part i admit.and big ass land? not really no.like i said, less than Rm1k? not worth to fight.

My comment is about commodity priceDont change topicYou can say that the land is small or the loan is not favorable bla blaBut did IOI or Sime Darby provide all that in the first place?No of cozSo stop asking why Felda pay below the market rateNo other company will give you land, seedlings, advise, fertelizer, ready buyer and supply chain unlike FeldaYes they are screwed nowadays with mismangement and shady policies but that is a different topic already
RM500 pun nak kecohFELDA settlers are much more richer than you think la ptui!
who is changing topic?is felda run like a free market or communism?

Its common business senseDid you know that Felda have obligation to buy the commodity even tho they actually over stock and no no business need to buy more?Unlike KLK, Sime Darby or IOI who can play around and decide when or how much they want to buyThat is a hell of business security to the peneroka'sAnd you still want to argued that they pay bit lower?Man...you are something...seems your hatherd towards the current gov clouding your judgementYou have subsidised, give resources and give your land and nurture them of course you cant match the market rate coz bulk of the company monies have gone to the nurturing programLike my current employer we provide expensive SAP, AI and host of other software prog certifications free of charge and no contract bond to the fresh grads so in return our fresh grads is being paid tad lower than the top IT giants because lot of resources has gone to the expensive training expenditure for them....the fresh grad also cant complain much as they dont need to bond themselves to the company and spend much on certification.....not to mention after paid so much the company of course want to retain these guys....this is a job security to them in return also......its a win win situation
